title: Full Size Washer and Dryer, Breakfast Bar*, Convenient Online Payments
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1105 Sq.
Welcome to Arbor Place, where friendly small-town atmosphere meets with big-town accessible entertainment.
Located just west of Atlanta in Douglasville, Georgia, Arbor Place Apartments was designed for casual contemporary living.
With an incredible suite of amenities and features, each of our one-, two- and three-bedroom floor plans come with stylish interiors and resort-style amenities are right outside your door.
Nothing beats next-level living at Arbor Place, so schedule your personal tour of your new home today!

Large Walk-in Closets, Pre-wired for Intrusion Alarm, Breakfast Bar*, Designer Interiors, 9-Foot Ceilings, Built-in Desk Alcove*, Plan Wood Style Flooring*, Private Balcony or Patio Space, Full Size Washer and Dryer, Crown Molding, Kitchen Island*

Resident Communication Portal, Sparkling Swimming Pool, Fitness Center and Yoga Studio, Car Care Center, Online Maintenance Request, Play Park, Leash Free Bark Park, Convenient Online Payments, Package Receiving, Cyber Cafe with Coffee Bar, Outdoor Walking Track, Poolside Lounge, Outdoor Grilling Stations, Controlled Access, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service
Arbor Place is a pet-friendly apartment community and provides a wonderful place for you and your pet to live.
We understand why you would to have a lovable companion and the benefits they provide to our well-being.
Arbor Place believes that pet-friendly apartments are an important part of life, which is why we have policies to accommodate pet ownership.
Please contact our office for details and applicable fees and deposits.
